attributes.additional_details:
The £9000 per year (maximum) tuition fee in universities is appalling and stopping many bright and talented young people from going to university as they cannot afford the tuition fees.
Not only is this completely unfair, but it is also going to affect Britain's future. We, the youth, are the future of this country. If we are unable to educate ourselves further we cannot possibly keep taking this country forward or achieve our true potential.  And consequently, the whole country will suffer.
Therefore I am calling for the government to reduce the maximum tuition fee to £6000 per year.
